alert.note: Alert for Clatsop; Tillamook (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 08 at 12:59AM PST until January 08 at 7:28AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Oregon...Washington... Tualatin River near Dilley affecting Washington County. Cowlitz River at Kelso affecting Cowlitz County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oregon... Washington... Luckiamute River near Suver affecting Polk and Benton Counties. Nehalem River near Foss affecting Tillamook and Clatsop Counties. Grays River near Rosburg affecting Wahkiakum County. Pudding River at Aurora affecting Clackamas and Marion Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Nehalem River near Foss. * WHEN...Until this morning. * IMPACTS...Above 15.0 feet, expect minor flooding of low lying farm land and structures. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 PM PST Friday the stage was 16.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:15 PM PST Friday was 18.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage around 8 AM PST this morning and continue falling through the weekend. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive through flooded areas. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued later this morning.
